text: Welcome is an unincorporated community in Whatcom County, in the U.S. state of Washington. ==History== A post office called Welcome was established in 1889, and remained in operation until 1917. John Welcome Riddle, an early postmaster, gave the community his middle name. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Whatcom County, Washington Category:Unincorporated communities in Washington (state)
title: Welcome, Washington
